translation.rsvpBy: Please fill out the RSVP form provided as soon as possible,
translation.firstNight: Your room at the resort is on us for the night of the wedding! It will include usage of the heated pools, as well as breakfast the day after.
translation.extraNights: If you'd like to stay extra nights,
translation.pleaseMark: please mark it in the RSVP
translation.extraNightsContinue: and we will make the extended booking for you. It will be 172 lv (~88€) per room per night, including usage of the pools, plus breakfast, lunch and dinner.
translation.flightRecommendation: We recommend flying from Helsinki to Varna (55km from Topola) or Burgas (172km from Topola). Norwegian and Turkish Airlines have had direct or at least quicker summer flights in the past. Please consider that Summer season in Bulgaria starts in June, so it's important to book your flights as early as you can.
translation.fromVarna: From Varna or Burgas, you can either get a rental car or we can arrange a shuttle for you. If you will need a shuttle,
translation.pleaseMarkFlight: please check the box in the RSVP and write down which airport you are using in the 'Additional message' field
translation.freeParking: There is free parking at the Topola resort.
translation.welcomeDrinksLocation: Topola Skies lawn overlooking the sea, next to the infinity pool.
translation.weddingCeremonyLocation: Continuing in the same location as the welcome drinks.
translation.receptionLocation: Cliffside restaurant in front of the seafront lawn. Entrance from the amphitheatre next to the infinity pool.
translation.dressSmart: Wear something stylish and comfortable. We are hoping for weather around 20-25°C.
translation.onlyYou: You being there is all we need!
translation.notNecessary: No need to bring us anything in addition and please no flowers.
translation.ifRich: In case you have won the lottery and would like to share the profits with us, our bank account is:
translation.name: Full name
translation.declinedMessage: We are sorry you can't make it.
translation.shuttleMessage: Airport shuttle info coming later on.

translation.rsvpBy: Olkaa hyvä ja täyttäkää RSVP lomake mahdollisimman nopeasti,
translation.firstNight: Me tarjoamme hääyön majoituksen! Siihen sisältyy lämmitettyjen altaiden käyttö sekä seuraavan päivän aamiainen.
translation.extraNights: Mikäli haluaisitte yöpyä Topolassa useamman yön,
translation.extraNightsContinue: ja me järjestämme huonevarauksen haluamallenne ajalle. Se tulee maksamaan 172 lv (~88€) per yö ja sisältää altaiden käytön, aamiaisen, lounaan ja päivällisen.
translation.flightRecommendation: Suosittelemme lentoa Helsingistä Varnaan (55km Topolasta) tai Burgasiin (172km Topolasta). Norwegian ja Turkish Airlines ovat aiemmin tarjonneet suoria tai melko nopeita lentoja kesäisin. Huomioi, että kesäkausi Bulgariassa alkaa Kesäkuussa, eli kannattaa varata lennot mahdollisimman ajoissa.
translation.fromVarna: Varnasta tai Burgasista pääset joko vuokra-autolla tai me voimme järjestää lentokenttäkuljetuksen. Muista merkitä käyttämäsi lentokenttä 'Lisäviesti'-kenttään. Mikäli tulet tarvitsemaan lentokenttäkuljetuksen,
translation.pleaseMarkFlight: merkitse se RSVP lomakkeeseen ja kirjoita käyttämäsi lentokenttä 'Lisäviesti'-kenttään
translation.welcomeDrinksLocation: Topola Skiesin nurmikko merinäköalalla, äärettömän altaa vieressä.
translation.receptionLocation: Merinäkoalan nurmikon jyrkänteenpuoleinen ravintola. Sisäänkäynti amfiteatterilta, äärettömän altaan vieressä.
translation.dressSmart: Pukeudu tyylikkäästi ja mukavasti. Toivomme lämpötilan olevan noin 20-25°C.
translation.notNecessary: Ei tarvitse tuoda mitään ylimääräisiä lahjoja tai kukkia.
translation.ifRich: Mikäli olet voittanut lotossa ja haluat jakaa tuotot kanssamme, niin tilinumeromme on:
translation.name: Koko nimi

translation.rsvpBy: Молим да попълиниш RSVP формата на сайта ни възможно най-скоро,
translation.firstNight: Ние ви черпим нощувката в комплекса в деня на сватбата! Тя ще включва ползване на отоплените басейни на комплекса, както и закуска на следващия ден.
translation.extraNights: Ако искаш да останеш повече нощувки,
translation.extraNightsContinue: ние ще направим резервацията от твое име. Допълнителните нощувки са 172лв/вечер/стая за all inclusive.
translation.flightRecommendation: Ако можеш да прочетеш този текст, тази опция не е за теб. :)
translation.welcomeDrinksLocation: На поляната на комплекса до басейн инфинити.
translation.receptionLocation: В ресторанта до амфитеатъра до басейн инфинити.
translation.dressSmart: Облечи нещо стилно и удобно. Надяваме се на температури около 20-25°C.
translation.onlyYou: Твоето присъствие е най-големият подарък за нас!
translation.notNecessary: Не е нужно да носиш нищо допълнително, включително цветя.
translation.ifRich: В случай, че си спечелил националната лотария и държиш да споделиш печалбите си с нас, банковата ни сметка е:
translation.name: Три имена
translation.declinedMessage: Съжаляваме, че няма да успееш да дойдеш.
